skill.name: The Tie that Binds
skill.description: Until the end of your turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters on your field times 100. This Skill can only be used once per turn.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate
Dr. Vellian Crowler appears at the gate at Stage 6 (GX)
The Ancient Gear Archetype cards are the best drop rewards available from Dr. Crowler
, in a Duel against Dr. Velian Crowler at level 30.
Inflict 2,000 or more points of effect damage with a single effect activation in a Duel against Dr. Velian Crowler at level 30 using
Achieve 1 Comeback Victory(ies) in Duels against Dr. Velian Crowler at level 30 using

Achieve 3 Win(s) using only Machine-Type Monster Cards in Duel World (GX) Duels.

skill.name: Surprise Present
skill.description: Select 1 card Set in your Spell & Trap Zone, and force it on your opponent. Only the player that activates this Skill can view this card. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

skill.name: Rise from the Valley of Flames
skill.description:
At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Salamangreat Heatleo" to your Extra Deck.

The following effect can be used if your Life Points are at 2000 or below. Select 1 "Salamangreat" Link Monster you control, and add 1 monster with the same name to your Extra Deck. Then, play "Salamangreat Sanctuary" to your field from outside of your Deck. 

This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

Unlocking Soulburner will also unlock Duel World (VRAINS)

skill.description: Until the end of your turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters on your field times 100. This Skill can only be used once per turn.

skill.name: Sealed Tombs
skill.description: Can be used if your Life Points are lower than your opponent's by 1000 or more. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can banish cards from the Graveyard or Special Summon monsters from the Graveyard. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
